import React, { useState } from "react"; import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import axios from "axios"; const Signup = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [otpSent, setOtpSent] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Send a POST request to your backend to send the OTP await axios.post("https://65fd48049fc4425c65319005.mockapi.io/Projects/Demo", { name, email, password }) .then(()=>{ window.location.reload(); }) setOtpSent(true); // console.log(otpSent); } catch (error) { console.error("Error sending OTP:", error); } }; console.log(name); return (

Create Your Account

setName(e.target.value)} className="appearance-none block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="appearance-none block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm" />
